=======

0.0.0.0 (2019-06-14)
--------------------

* First release on PyPI.

------------------

* Initial test version

* Fixed the bug of the "__internal" package not being included in the pypi release

0.0.3 (2019-06-16)
------------------

* Fixed the "run" command not being associated with the "install" command group
